name: pamtre-berry
effect: No effect; only useful for planting and cooking.
short_effect: Used for creating PokéBlocks and Poffins.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow PAMTRE.
flavor_text.emerald: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow PAMTRE.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: Can be ground up into a powder as an ingredient for medicine.
